syllabus:
**Honors English Program: Communication Skills in English (****英語口語溝通技巧****)**

**Instructor:** Nicholas Sumares (nicksumares@gmail.com)

**Time:** Thurs 15:30-17:20

**Objective:**

The course aims to enhance non-English majors' oral English communication skills. It consists of three parts. The first part targets at elevating students' competence in conducting and managing social conversation in English. The second part focuses on cultivating students' ability to give a speech or an oral presentation. The last part of the course aims to develop students' ability to participate in oral argumentation by acquiring the knowledge of the argumentation process, critical thinking skills, and argumentative discourse.
